THROTTLE.MESSAGE:
‚è∞ Please wait **${EXPIRATION}** before reusing the command again.

The cooldown for this command is **${COMMAND_COOLDOWN}**

COMMAND.OWNER_ONLY: Sorry, this command is only available to the Bot Owner.
COMMAND.MISSING_PERMISSIONS:
Sorry, but you need the following permission(s) to perform this command.
```html
${PERMISSIONS}
```
COMMAND.MISSING_BOT_PERMISSIONS:
Sorry, but I need the following permission(s) to perform this command.
```html
${PERMISSIONS}
```
COMMAND.NO_ARGUMENTS:
Sorry, You didn't provide any arguments, ${AUTHOR}!
The proper usage would be:
```html
${USAGE}
```
COMMAND.NOT_ENOUGH_ARGUMENTS:
Sorry, You didn't specify enough arguments to execute this command.
The proper usage would be:
```html
${USAGE}
```
COMMAND.COMMAND_DISABLED: Sorry, that command is currently disabled.

PROMPT.TIMEOUT:
You did not reply within **${TIMEOUT}**

Please try again.

ERRORS.BOOLEAN:
Sorry, it should be a valid boolean
It's either `true`, `false`, `yes`, `no`, `y`, `n`

Please try again.
ERRORS.NUMBER:
Sorry, it should be a valid Number

Please try again.
ERRORS.USER:
Sorry, it should be a valid User

You can type the User's ID, Username, Tag or you can even mention the User.

Please try again.
ERRORS.ROLE:
Sorry, it should be a valid Role

You can type the Role's ID, Name or you can even mention the Role.

Please try again.
ERRORS.TEXT_CHANNEL:
Sorry, it should be a valid Text Channel

You can type the Text Channel's ID, Name or you can even mention the text channel.

Please try again.
ERRORS.VOICE_CHANNEL:
Sorry, it should be a valid Voice Channel

You can type the Voice Channel's ID or Name

Please try again.
ERRORS.CATEGORY_CHANNEL:
Sorry, it should be a valid Category Channel

You can type the Category Channel's ID or Name

Please try again.
ERRORS.COMMAND:
Sorry, it should be a valid Command

You can type the Command's name or some of it's aliases

Please try again.
